items.question: Does the digital menu connect to my POS?
items.answer: Yes. Boteco Pro syncs menu, orders, and payments to update inventory and reports automatically.

items.question: Can I manage suppliers and events together?
items.answer: You control quotes, deliveries, event agendas, and teams in collaborative workflows across the platform.

items.question: Is there a ready-to-use loyalty program?
items.answer: Absolutely. Configure points, cashback, or stamp rules with automated notifications and retention analytics.
